alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Salt Lake... southeastern Davis...southern Morgan...western Summit and northwestern Utah Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 331 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Draper, or near Sandy, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, Bountiful, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, Herriman, North Salt Lake, Alpine, Bluffdale and Summit Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 286 and 313. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 114 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
